segments.text: Why do you want to be a teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a job I have been dreaming of for many years . While it is difficult , I am convinced that there is nothing more noble and rewarding than this profession .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know about our school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , a little . I know your school is one of the best known in this town . There are about 200 children in the school .
segments.speaker: S2
